Beautiful brick apartment building in Coolidge Corner close to the Green Line T, shops, recreational facilities, restaurants, pubs, movie theatre, and more.
This gorgeous studio has gleaming hardwood floors, high ceilings, and an updated kitchen.
Heat and hot water are included.
Residents are responsible for cooking gas and electricity.
Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!
